short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically analyse games on Lichess.org without clicking any extra buttons.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our Chrome extension automate the clicking through multiple buttons to analyze your Lichess games. The process will be automated after finishing the games. 
You will get a popup summarizing the game results.

After finishing the game the analytics start automatically. 
If you disable the Auto-Run and keep the extension running. that will make the analysis popup appear only when you click on "ANALYSIS BOARD" in Lichess.

Please note, the analysis may take some time depending on Lichess's processing speed, but the extension ensures that you get a streamlined and efficient experience.

Q&A here:
https://www.reddit.com/r/lichess/comments/1exj35j/introducing_lichess_auto_analyser_analyze_your/

- Automated Clicking: Streamlines the process by automatically clicking through multiple buttons to access and analyze your Lichess games.
- Instant Analytics: Initiates game analysis automatically once a game is finished.
- Game Summary Popup: Provides a summary of game results through a popup for quick review.
- User-Friendly Interface.
